Check whether specific coins are currently spendable (not locked or pending).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the get_are_coins_spendable endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Check if specific coins are spendable","required":["coin_ids"],"properties":{"coin_ids":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"List of coin IDs to check"}},"title":"GetAreCoinsSpendable"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from get_are_coins_spendable","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with spendability status","required":["spendable"],"properties":{"spendable":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether all coins are spendable","example":true}},"title":"GetAreCoinsSpendableResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
